description:
This class is designed to introduce you to After Effects and teach you the core fundamentals of 2D/3D Animation. We will be exploring the After Effects Interface as well as the tools and effects to make your graphics come to life.

I will be using After Effects CS6, but the techniques and skill set you will learn applies to versions CS3 and up.

This course will be screen-capture video; giving you the opportunity to pause, jump over to After Effects, and work alongside with me. Or, if you prefer, just sit back and take notes.
title: Introduction to Adobe After Effects
